description: Try our easy to follow Piri-piri Stir-fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Piri-piri Stir-fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, heavy-based wok or frying pan and cook the chicken over a high heat, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until golden in places.

Meanwhile, mix together all the ingredients for the piri-piri sauce and add to the pan with the chicken. Stir-fry for a further 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce flavours the chicken and the chicken is cooked through. Garnish with fresh thyme sprigs.
Serve hot with express rice and a crisp green salad.
